description: This file contains end-to-end tests using Cypress for testing high-level UI flows of a Notebook application, including rendering, theme switching, note creation, editing, searching, bulk delete/restore, organization in folders, and export/import functionalities.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up the test environment by visiting the root URL before each test.

methods.name: renders main UI and theme switch works
methods.description: Verifies that the main UI renders correctly and theme switching functionality works.

methods.name: can create and edit a note
methods.description: Tests creating a new note, editing its title and content, and saving it.

methods.name: search finds notes
methods.description: Tests the search functionality by searching for a note by its title.

methods.name: bulk delete/restore works
methods.description: Tests bulk deletion and restoration of notes in the trash.

methods.name: export/import works
methods.description: Checks the presence of export button, ensuring export feature is accessible.
